content.name: html_hardreset

Reset Application

If you have encounted a serious error with the application, or are experiencing issues that are blocking you from progressing through the Job or the app, please take a screenshot of the above log stream and select the Reset button below.

WARNING: Once you have selected the Reset option, you will lose any data you currently have on device related to the current Job.

Priority: {{'$store.jobs.jobSummary.sPriority'|store}}

Home: {{'$store.jobs.jobSummary.aPropertyDetail.sHome_No'|store}}

content.name: html_riskassessment
content.content: The Risk Assessment must be completed prior to carrying out daily works.

content.name: questionOne
content.label: I have identified and put into place control measures for all the significant work I am required to carry out. I have referred to RA Guidance and generic RA as required.

content.name: questionTwo
content.label: I have identified all the persons exposed to the work I am carrying out and have included them in my risk assessment having put in place any necessary control measures to protect them.

content.name: questionThree
content.label: The tools and equipment I am planning to use are suitable for the task and to the best of my knowledge, free from faults and defects.

content.name: questionFour
content.label: I have identified all the PPE equipment and will ensure it is worn correctly.

content.name: questionFive
content.label: Access equipment used is within its period of inspection, will only be used by those that are trained to do so, and I will abide by the 'Working at Height' safety instructions.

content.name: questionSix
content.label: Access equipment used is within its period of inspection, will only be used by those that are trained to do so, and I will abide by the 'Working at Height' safety instructions.

content.name: questionSeven
content.label: If the work involves manual handling I will ensure that the load is within my lifting capability.

content.name: questionEight
content.label: If the task involves the use of any hazardous substances (including asbestos) I will follow the COSHH safety data sheet/asbestos procedures as necessary and ensure all precautions are taken.

content.name: confirmRiskAssessment
content.label: Have you read and understood the full Risk Assessment Policy relating to this type of work and is it safe to proceed to do the work?

content.name: html_rafailed
content.content: One or more of the above checks has failed. Please call your Supervisor by tapping on the icon above before continuing...

content.name: html_ra_abandon
content.content: Are you sure you want to fail the Risk Assessment and Abandon this job?

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: An optional panel title

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: A message to display whilst the spinner is showing

attributes.name: minCharacters
attributes.description: Min number of characters to be entered before it will auto-search ahead

attributes.name: maxResults
attributes.description: Maximum number of results to output (defaults to 30)

attributes.name: displayListIfNoSearch
attributes.description: Governs display of results if a search is not active default to 0

attributes.name: sourceObjectArrayName
attributes.description: Name of the source object array you want to search (eg. cti.model.customerList)

attributes.name: displayArrayName
attributes.description: Name of the array to populate with search results, which you should then bind to a list (eg. cti.model.mySearchResults)

events.name: searchComplete
events.description: Fired when a search has finished actioning

components.name: PhotoManager
components.description: Manage photos, capture, delete, store and display

attributes.name: captureWidth
attributes.description: Width restriction on captured photos

attributes.name: captureHeight
attributes.description: Height restriction on captured photos

attributes.name: captureQuality
attributes.description: QUality setting for captured photos

attributes.name: captureCategory
attributes.description: Optional category identifier to assign to photos when captured.

attributes.name: displayCategory
attributes.description: Optional category on which to filter display of photos

attributes.name: maxPhotos
attributes.description: Maximum number of photos that can be captured in this category (default is 3)

events.name: captureComplete
events.description: Fired when a photo has been captured

events.name: editPhoto
events.description: Fired when user selects edit option

events.name: maxPhotosTaken
events.description: Fired when we have taken the maximum number of photos in this category

params.name: filename
params.description: A filename to allocate to the capture photo

params.name: id
params.description: The internal id of the photo to remove

attributes.name: minCharacters
attributes.description: Min number of characters to be entered before it will auto-search ahead

attributes.name: maxResults
attributes.description: Maximum number of results to output (defaults to 30)

attributes.name: displayListIfNoSearch
attributes.description: Governs display of results if a search is not active default to 0

attributes.name: sourceObjectArrayName
attributes.description: Name of the source object array you want to search (eg. cti.model.customerList). If not specified, sordata in pouchdb will be used as the source

attributes.name: displayArrayName
attributes.description: Name of the array to populate with search results, which you should then bind to a list (eg. cti.model.mySearchResults)

attributes.name: locationFilter
attributes.description: Location id filter by which to restrict result selection (empty value will be unfiltered)

attributes.name: pouchDB
attributes.description: Select your pouch DB instance

events.name: searchComplete
events.description: Fired when a search has finished actioning
